title: ADD_CAM_SPLINE_NODE_USING_CAMERA
content:
0x0FB82563989CF4FB0xBA6C085B// AddCamSplineNodeUsingCamera
void ADD_CAM_SPLINE_NODE_USING_CAMERA(Cam cam, Cam cam2, int length, int p3);Parameters:cam: Camera to add cam2 as a node tocam2: Camera used for referencelength: Duration used for transition, has no effect for the first node.p3: Takes a camera and uses the information from it as a camera spline node.Examples:C#AddCamSplineNodeUsingCamera(cam, CreateCamWithParams("DEFAULT_SCRIPTED_CAMERA", 975.9832f, 191.3923f, 86.82342f, -2.795285f, -0f, 154.0656f, 45f, true, 2), 5000, 3);
codeBlocks:
